mapper.insert: insert into orders(ordersid , ordercode , usersid , goodsid , price , num , total , addtime , status ) values(#{ordersid} , #{ordercode} , #{usersid} , #{goodsid} , #{price} , #{num} , #{total} , #{addtime} , #{status} )
mapper.update: update orders set ordercode=#{ordercode} , usersid=#{usersid} , goodsid=#{goodsid} , price=#{price} , num=#{num} , total=#{total} , addtime=#{addtime} , status=#{status} where ordersid=#{ordersid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.goodsname from orders a , users b , goods c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.goodsid = c.goodsid order by ordersid desc
select a.* , b.username , c.goodsname from orders a , users b , goods c where a.usersid = b.usersid and a.goodsid = c.goodsid and ordersid=#{ordersid} order by ordersid desc
